name: Ice Toboggan Corki
description: Having broken the land-speed record in most other vehicular sports, Corki has turned his attention to the ice luge—a momentum-based activity that doesn't require a state-of-the-art flying sled with a forward-mounted machine gun. He brought one anyway.
